description:
Ubuntu 25.04 “Plucky Puffin” operating system has been slated for release next year on April 17th, 2025, and it’s expected to come with the GNOME 48 desktop environment and Linux kernel 6.14.

The post Ubuntu 25.04 “Plucky Puffin” Is Slated for Release on April 17th, 2025 appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Ubuntu 25.04 “Plucky Puffin” Is Slated for Release on April 17th, 2025

description:
Audacity 3.7 open-source digital audio editor and recording software is now available for download with improved Linux compatibility and various bug fixes. Here's what's changed!

The post Audacity 3.7 Open-Source Audio Editor Is Out to Improve Linux Compatibility appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Audacity 3.7 Open-Source Audio Editor Is Out to Improve Linux Compatibility

description:
TUXEDO OS 4 distribution is now available for download powered by Linux kernel 6.11 and KDE Plasma 6.1, based on Ubuntu 24.04.1 LTS. Here's what's new!

The post TUXEDO OS 4 Launches with Ubuntu 24.04 LTS Base and Linux Kernel 6.11 appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: TUXEDO OS 4 Launches with Ubuntu 24.04 LTS Base and Linux Kernel 6.11

description:
Shotcut 24.10 open-source video editor is now available for download with a new AI-powered speech-to-text feature based on OpenAI's Whisper, as welll as other changes. Here's what's new!

The post Shotcut 24.10 Open-Source Video Editor Released with AI-Powered Speech to Text appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Shotcut 24.10 Open-Source Video Editor Released with AI-Powered Speech to Text
